# Patient Predator
## Overview
You are learned in the ways of hunting dangerous prey.

## Requirements and Restrictions
**Prerequisite**: *[[Kraidyl]]*

## Effects
You gain the following benefits:

- You can try to hide when you are lightly obscured from the creature from which you are hiding.
- You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice from the following list: Strength (Athletics), Dexterity (Acrobatics), Dexterity (Stealth), Intelligence (Nature), Wisdom (Survival), and Charisma (Deception).
- When you roll damage for a melee weapon attack against a surprised target, you can reroll the damage dice and use either total.
- Your bite gains the finesse property.
